title: Building
creator_credit: Dale Smith, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Dale Smith dedicates her story to her dad, a man of infinite creativity and resourcefulness. His inventiveness extended to building houses, caravans, mobile homes, trailers and, above all, a family who adore him.
